Subject: Reporting
Description: We need to audit which machines have explicitly been allowed to access USB Storage Devices. I could not find a report in the portal that would show this. Can you extract this data?
What_We_Know__c: The customer asked for a way to export the computers where the rights for USB Storage Devices are set to Allow access
Next_Steps__c: I provided a workaround to the customer
Account_Name__c: University of Texas Health Science Center in Houston
